title: Redshift 7
description: A Music Library for Space Games
longDescription:
Redshift 7 is a music library designed to be used in space themed mediums and it consists of 27 tracks including menu, exploration, action and other themes.


Aren't you tired of browsing pages after pages to find fitting songs for your project and seeing that when you put them together they â€‹sound musically inconsistent in the end?


Redshift 7 is designed by taking these issues into account to eliminate them. Transitioning from one song to any other song in this album feels so natural because all of the songs in the album share the same theme, concept, root and dynamism. Redshift 7's production is centred around the quickly changing scenery and atmosphere of today's mediums. Adaptation to changing atmosphere was the main focus of Redshift 7's production.


With the help of Redshift 7, you will no longer need to search for individual tracks on multiple websites. Focus on your creative process and let this album released by One Man Symphony handle the musical aspect of your project for you.


Watch The Album Trailer Here
